./external/basejump_stl/bsg_misc/bsg_dff_en.v Cov: 100% 

   1: /**
   2:  *  bsg_dff_en.v
   3:  *  @param width_p data width
   4:  */
   5: 
   6: module bsg_dff_en #(parameter width_p="inv"
   7:                    ,parameter harden_p=1   // mbt fixme: maybe this should not be a default
   8:                    ,parameter strength_p=1)
   9: (
  10:   input clk_i
  11:   ,input [width_p-1:0] data_i
  12:   ,input en_i
  13:   ,output logic [width_p-1:0] data_o
  14: );
  15: 
  16:   logic [width_p-1:0] data_r;
  17: 
  18:   assign data_o = data_r;
  19: 
  20:   always_ff @ (posedge clk_i) begin
  21:     if (en_i) begin
  22:       data_r <= data_i;
  23:     end
  24:   end
  25: 
  26: endmodule
  27:
